name: HexWorld (PangDev)
description:
What is HexWorld?

HexWorld is a Tower defence-like game where you begin with 1 tile and a dream, expanding your way out by making homes for your fellow goblins, by building homes and claiming resource tiles on the map.

However, the world is full  many hostile goblins who don't seek to live peacefully. Your days are numbered, but you get to decide for how long.

Techy stuff

The maps are built by rendering the 3d hex tile-grid on startup and reading a CSV file connected to the map selected, and assigning properties like land or water, as well as placing the players keep and resources.
